name: Moonsign
desc:
When Moonsign characters are in the party, the party will attain a Moonsign Level corresponding to the number of such characters.
As your party's Moonsign Level increases, some of the Moonsign characters' skills will be enhanced, as well as the effects of some Weapons and Artifacts. Other characters can also provide buffs to the party.
Furthermore, in Nod-Krai, where the new moon rises, there appear to be other ways to increase your party's Moonsign Level...
